about_the_game:
"Karoshi Club" is a first-person horror adventure game. Take on the role of Kumi Yamane, a driven career young woman and highly successful manager in the soul sales industry. The afterlife world of Yomi is on a significant major upheaval, and the Keneō Industry сorporation will be the first to suffer from the impending disaster. Navigate a complex web of mysteries, make crucial decisions, and try to survive in a world you have helped change.

  • Sales Manager Simulator: During work hours, sell souls over the phone, sing karaoke after work… and eat the most disgusting ramen of your afterlife.

  • Dark Japanese Business Punk: Imagine the afterlife world of Yomi from Japanese medieval myth, but in modern times with modern issues, empty offices, and a realm full of ghosts.

  • Horror Manga Visual Style: We combined 3D technology with 2D character images to create an immersive interactive manga feeling.

- Moshi Moshi
- You will get a job in Seven Days

Our multinational indie team is a group of game developers impacted by layoffs in the gaming industry in 2023. However, we refused to give up and used this to create something of our own. We are determined to develop games and create specific worlds we are passionate about, and we hope you will love them just as much as we do.

Listen to the stories from Kamishibai while you sit back.

content_descriptors.notes: The game is an experience that combines a soul sales job with horror elements.

detailed_description:
Community Challenge

Join the Special Limited-Time Community Challenge:
Wishlist Karoshi Club to unlock bonus free updates!
The more players wishlist the game, the more free rewards will be unlocked for everyone at launch and after.

Goal 1: 2,500 Wishes - "Paper Crane"

This chapter introduces a new mysterious antagonist known as Origami. Kumi is tasked with traveling to an abandoned subway station, where she must confront this eccentric enemy who transforms everything around him into origami figures. The official soundtrack for Karoshi Club will also feature a music track titled “Origami Theme.”

Goal 2: 5,000 Wishes - "Summer Hats"

In the world of Yomi, Kumi can discover cute hats for her beloved pet, July the larva. Back in her apartment, Kumi will have the opportunity to try on all the hats she finds.

Goal 3: 7,500 wishes - “Work Incidents”

Work-life in Keneō Industry will include additional random events to make each working day memorable.

Goal 4: 10,000 Wishes - "Burning Sands"

After finishing the game's main storyline, players will unlock an additional chapter that delves into the backstory of one of the heroes from Karoshi Club, named Burny. The official soundtrack for Karoshi Club will also feature a new music track titled "Burny Theme."

Goal 5: 12,500 wishes - “Karaoke for Two”

The “Karaoke” game activity will add two new music tracks. Two music tracks will also be included in the official soundtrack for Karoshi Club.

Goal 6: Achieve 15,000 Wishes - "Love and Death"

Kumi will finally have the opportunity to fall in love, even after death. Accomplishing this goal will unlock the ability to form relationships with one of two co-workers from Keneō Industry and reveal unique story missions.

The challenge will last until April 2025.

If some goals are completed after the deadline, some rewards may be unlocked differently after the game is released. Additionally, new goals can be added after achieving the last goal.

Try our free prologue "Welcome to the Karoshi Club"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
